examples: They killed her and buried her body.
La mataron y enterraron su cuerpo.
He was buried in Highgate Cemetery.
Fue enterrado en el cementerio de Highgate.
Their ambitions were finally dead and buried.
Sus ambiciones finalmente estaban muertas y enterradas.
She's 85 and has buried three husbands.
Tiene 85 años y ha enterrado a tres maridos.
